amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase funding by $3 million to be used for divertor test tokamak research and development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
